prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of a tall, muscular man, completely bald head, three functional eyes clearly visible on forehead, green martial arts gi vest, determined expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, sharp focus on the third eye structure, detailed fabric texture on vest, realistic skin pores and wrinkles
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, two eyes only, missing eye, blurry eyes, smooth skin, low quality
